Plot: A straight laced propane salesman in Arlen, Texas tries to deal with the wacky antics of his family and friends, while also to keep his son in line.
Title: King of the Hill
Actors: Mike Judge, Kathy Najimy, Pamela Adlon, Johnny Hardwick
Awards: Won 2 Primetime Emmys. Another 9 wins & 53 nominations.
